text: , son of Mototsugu, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Muromachi period (1336–1573). He held a regent position kampaku from 1361 to 1363. Kanetsugu was his son. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1333 births Category:1387 deaths
title: Konoe Michitsugu
